sentences.en: a brick wall
sentences.cn: 砖墙

sentences.en: a house made of brick
sentences.cn: 砖房

sentences.en: After that my career just seemed to hit a brick wall.
sentences.cn: 在那之后我的事业似乎就陷入了困境。

sentences.en: Arches are built of wood, stone, brick or any other building material.
sentences.cn: 拱门是用木料 、 石块 、 砖头或其他建筑材料建成的.

sentences.en: Brick rubble is useful as the base for paths and patios.
sentences.cn: 碎砖石可以用来铺路基和庭院地基。

sentences.en: Each brick also varies slightly in tone, texture and size.
sentences.cn: 每块砖在色调、质地与大小上也都略有不同。

sentences.en: He flattened himself against a brick wall as I passed.
sentences.cn: 他紧贴一面砖墙站着好让我通过。

sentences.en: He hurled a brick through the window.
sentences.cn: 他往窗户里扔了块砖。

sentences.en: Her car swerved off the road into a 6ft high brick wall.
sentences.cn: 她的车突然转向冲出了马路，撞向6英尺高的一面砖墙。

sentences.en: I wondered if I was banging my head against a brick wall.
sentences.cn: 我怀疑自己是不是在把鸡蛋往石头上碰，徒劳无益。

sentences.en: On South Main Street, a huge brick building looms into view.
sentences.cn: 在南大街上，一座巨大的砖砌建筑赫然出现在人们的视线中。

sentences.en: Protesters attacked the police with stones and bricks.
sentences.cn: 抗议者用石头和砖块袭击警察。

sentences.en: She stared blankly at the brick wall in front of her.
sentences.cn: 她面无表情地瞪着面前的砖墙.

sentences.en: Someone had flung a brick through the window.
sentences.cn: 有人把一块砖扔进了窗户。

sentences.en: the FA came down on him like a ton of bricks.
sentences.cn: 足球协会以咄咄逼人之势向他兴师问罪。

sentences.en: The house was a handsome four-story brick structure.
sentences.cn: 这所房子是一幢造型美观的四层砖砌建筑物。

sentences.en: The school is built of brick.
sentences.cn: 那所学校是用砖建造的。

sentences.en: The sidewalks were paved with brick and lined with trees.
sentences.cn: 人行道铺着砖，两边种着树。

sentences.en: untold acres are being buried under bricks and mortar.
sentences.cn: 数不清的土地正被用来建造房屋。

sentences.en: You were a brick, a real friend in need.
sentences.cn: 你很够朋友，是真正的患难之交。

phrases.phrase: a brick short of a load

phrases.tran_cn: 空心砖；通风砖；不烧砖；砖坯

phrases.phrase: be built like a brick shithouse
come up against (或 hit) a brick wall

phrases.tran_cn: (非正式)具有压倒性的重量（影响或权威），势不可挡
◎[俚语][总称](作为有投资价值的物质实体的)房屋，建筑物；房产

phrases.phrase: you can't make bricks without straw

trans.tran_cn: 砖，积木，落难时可靠的人
trans.tran_en: a hard block of baked clay used for building walls, houses etc
